original_text: And afterward came out his brother, that had the scarlet thread upon his hand: and his name was called Zarah.
korean_text: 그의 형 곧 손에 홍색 실 있는 자가 뒤에 나오니 그의 이름을 세라라 불렀더라

sentences.original_text: And afterward came out his brother
that had the scarlet thread upon his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손에는 붉은 실이 감겨 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and his name was called Zarah
